Edges-Disciple -- Female Finnar Human Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Cold Blooded: -2 Vigor (resist cold)
Disciple Of Hothar: +2 vs. mind effects
Disciple Of Kenaz: +2 Vigor (resist heat)
Disciple Of Thunor: +1 Vigor (resist hot and cold), suffers half falling damage
Skills (28 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d6+2 Stealth: (agi) d8
Boating: (agi) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d8 Survival: (sma) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4+1 Notice: (sma) d8+2 Taunt: (sma) d8+1
Faith: (spi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d8 Thievery: (agi) d6+1
Fighting: (agi) d10 Research: (sma) d8+2
Gambling: (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d8
Skill Notes:
Alertness: +2 Notice
Disciple Of Eira: +2 Healing/5 companions +2 natural Healing
Disciple Of Hoenir: +1 Common Knowledge/+1 all Knowledge/Can make untrained Knowledge skills
Disciple Of The Unknowable One: +1 Taunt/+1 vs. Taunt
Investigator: +2 Research/+2 Notice (sifting for information)
Scholar (Academics): +2 Academics
Thief: +1 Climb (urban)/+1 Stealth (urban)/+1 Thievery
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: +1 Faith (vegetated areas)
Disciple Of Ertha: +2 Survival (underground)
Disciple Of Hela: +1 Faith (graveyards)
Disciple Of Nauthiz: Can reroll 1s on Gambling, Stealth, and Thievery; suffers fatigue for 1 dy if reroll is 1
Disciple Of Sigel: +2 Notice (detect hidden objects and creatures)
Disciple Of Ullr: +2 Stealth (wilderness)/+2 Survival (wilderness)
Size: 0 Deity: Var
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 30 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Skill: 16
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (1 points): Alertness; Arcane Background (Miracles); Beast Bond; Disciple Of Dargar; Disciple Of Eira; Disciple Of Eostre Animalmother; Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother; Disciple Of Ertha; Disciple Of Freo; Disciple Of Hela; Disciple Of Hoenir; Disciple Of Hothar; Disciple Of Kenaz; Disciple Of Maera; Disciple Of Nauthiz; Disciple Of Neorthe; Disciple Of Niht; Disciple Of Rigr; Disciple Of Scaetha; Disciple Of Sigel; Disciple Of The Norns; Disciple Of The Unknowable One; Disciple Of Thrym; Disciple Of Thunor; Disciple Of Tiw; Disciple Of Ullr; Disciple Of Vali; Disciple Of Var; Investigator; Marksman; Scholar (Academics); Thief Hindrances: Cautious; Cold Blooded; Shamed; Vow Finnar Human Features: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Beast Bond: Spend Bennies on companion animals
Beast Master: Has animal companion, other animals will not attack first
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Connections: Call in favors from acquaintance or organization
Disciple Of Eostre Animalmother: Has Beast Master feature with wild card companion animal
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: Can use Champion and Holy Warrior edges with plant creatures
Disciple Of Neorthe: Can survive on half water, can survive drowning for 8 rd
Disciple Of Niht: No penalty in dim and dark illumination, -2 in pitch dark
Disciple Of Rigr: Needs only 3 hrs sleep, suffers half penalty for missed sleep, counts as active guard when asleep
Disciple Of Sigel: Halves illumination penalty vs. heat-producing foes
Disciple Of Tiw: +1 Rank for acquiring combat edges
Disciple Of Vali: Immune to disease and poison
Disciple Of Var: Can sell goods at 50% price (Raise 75%)
Orders: Takes orders from outside power
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 9 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Scale Hauberk Shield: Large Shield Weapons: Long Bow: 1 (2d6 R15"); Short Sword: 1 (d8+d6); Sling: 1 (d8+d4 R4"); Unarmed: 1 (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Disciple Of Ertha: +1 Toughness
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Disciple Of Dargar: Single blow that incapacitates foe makes adjacent foes Shaken (Spirit neg)
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: Can move normally through vegetated difficult terrain
Disciple Of Freo: Treats all terrain as normal ground
Disciple Of Kenaz: +4 Armor vs. heat damage, can magically heat metal weapon for +2 damage vs. cold resistant and +4 vs cold immune
Disciple Of Scaetha: +2 damage vs. undead
Disciple Of Sigel: +2 vs. invisible foes
Disciple Of The Unknowable One: +1 on Tricks/+1 vs. Tricks
Disciple Of Ullr: Can move half Pace before using Marksman with bow
Marksman: Trade move for +1 ranged attack or -2 ranged attack penalties
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Burrow: (2 PP) R10" Allows merging into earth for 5 rd
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Havoc: (2 PP) R10" Distracts and throws creatures in 2" radius or 9" cone 2d6" (Strength neg)
Refuge: (3 PP) R10" 10'x6' shelter gives +2 Vigor vs. cold (Raise +4) for 12 hr
Voice On The Wind: (2 PP) RSelf Transmits 30-word message up to 500 miles to known target
Wilderness Step: (1 PP) RTouch Target treats all terrain as normal while maintained
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Miracles): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Disciple Of Hela: Dbl Raise on Zombie creates permanent undead
Disciple Of Maera: Can cast off-list spell at -2, +2 Dispel
Disciple Of Scaetha: +1 casting vs. undead
Disciple Of The Norns: Can spend benny for augury
Disciple Of Thrym: More effective casting in cold environment
Disciple Of Tiw: Can cast and attack in single action
